name: Dream Knights: The Little Hero
description:
Controls:
Move: WASD/Arrow Keys
Sword: Left Click
Arrows: Right Click/Space


Made for Ludum Dare 30 by SPOTCO, Josh Wong and Josephine Juang.

Falling asleep in class has never been so fun!
Dreaming Knight is a top-down/action/hack n slash/bullet hell mashup (with an rpg-style skill-tree!) made by three people in three days.
As you play, the "connected worlds" theme plays out in a strange way...

Controlled with WASD + Mouse

Like the game?
